articles.description: Melanie Joly’s elevation to foreign affairs minister came as a surprise, as Ottawa mulls a new Asia-Pacific strategy while dealing with political instability in the United States.
articles.content:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau is changing his top diplomat for the fifth time in six years.

articles.title: Southeast Asian leaders rebuke Myanmar junta after ASEAN summit no-show - Rappler
articles.description: The Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) says it would accept a non-political figure from Myanmar, but the junta rejects that, saying it would only agree to its leader or a minister attending
